content.html: I'll never forget, in one of my first all-day 5 hour on-site eng interviews in SF, a guy said "we're actually interviewing another woman after you- I think you'd really get along!". And I asked "oh really? Why?" and he didn't have an answer ğŸ˜µâ€ğŸ’«
content.value:
I'll never forget, in one of my first all-day 5 hour on-site eng interviews in SF, a guy said "we're actually interviewing another woman after you- I think you'd really get along!".

And I asked "oh really? Why?" and he didn't have an answer ğŸ˜µâ€ğŸ’«
